articles.title: Namibia halts use of Sputnik jabs after South Africa HIV fears - News24
articles.description: Namibia has discontinued the use of Russia's Sputnik V Covid-19 vaccine following concerns raised by neighbouring South Africa, the health ministry said.
articles.content:
• South Africa said it would not approve Sputnik V due to concerns it could increase the risk of HIV infection among men.
